TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Ports extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了用于访问计算机的串行端口的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides a property and a method for accessing the computer's serial ports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Ports` 对象提供了一个简单的入口点，用于访问 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 串行端口类，。The `My.Computer.Ports` object provides a straightforward entry point for accessing the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] serial port class, . 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Ports` 对象的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Ports` object. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |使用连接到串行端口的调制解调器拨号Dial a modem attached to a serial port|[如何：使用连接到串行端口的调制解调器拨号How to: Dial Modems Attached to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)| |将字符串发送到串行端口Send a string to a serial port|[如何：将字符串发送到串行端口How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)| |从串行端口接收字符串Receive strings from a serial port|[如何：从串行端口接收字符串How to: Receive Strings From Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-receive-strings-from-serial-ports.md)| |显示可用的串行端口Show available serial ports|[如何：显示可用的串行端口How to: Show Available Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例介绍如何将字符串发送到计算机的 `COM1` 串行端口。This example describes how to send strings to the computer's `COM1` serial port. `Using` 块允许应用程序在即使会生成异常的情况下也关闭串行端口。The `Using` block allows the application to close the serial port even if it generates an exception. 操作串行端口的所有代码都应出现在此块或 `Try...Catch...Finally` 块中，调用以使用 方法。All code that manipulates the serial port should appear within this block, or within a `Try...Catch...Finally` block with a call to use the method. 方法将数据发送到串行端口。The method sends the data to the serial port. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#33)] 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：将字符串发送到串行端口](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)。For more information, see [How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Ports.SerialPort OpenSerialPort (string portName);
.method public instance class System.IO.Ports.SerialPort OpenSerialPort(string portName) cil managed
Public Function OpenSerialPort (portName As String) As SerialPort
public: System::IO::Ports::SerialPort ^ OpenSerialPort(System::String ^ portName);
member this.OpenSerialPort : string -> System.IO.Ports.SerialPort

span.span: Required.
Name of the port to open.

summary.span: 创建并打开一个 对象。

span.span: Creates and opens a object.

returns.span: 一个打开的 对象，用提供的参数配置。

span.span: An open object, configured with the supplied arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` 方法创建并打开一个 对象。The `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method creates and opens a object. `OpenSerialPort` 方法的参数确定 对象的设置。The arguments to the `OpenSerialPort` method determine the settings of the object. 使用对象完成后，你的代码应关闭 的对象。Your code should close the object when it is finished using the object. 您可以使用 方法显式关闭该对象，或者 `Using` 语句隐式关闭它。You can use the method to close the object explicitly or the `Using` statement to close it implicitly. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的示例。See the example in this topic for more information. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` 方法的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |使用连接到串行端口的调制解调器拨号Dial a modem attached to a serial port|[如何：使用连接到串行端口的调制解调器拨号How to: Dial Modems Attached to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)| |将字符串发送到串行端口Send a string to serial port|[如何：将字符串发送到串行端口How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)| |从串行端口接收字符串Receive strings from a serial port|[如何：从串行端口接收字符串How to: Receive Strings From Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-receive-strings-from-serial-ports.md)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例介绍如何将字符串发送到计算机的 `COM1` 串行端口。This example describes how to send strings to the computer's `COM1` serial port. `Using` 块允许应用程序在即使会生成异常的情况下也关闭串行端口。The `Using` block allows the application to close the serial port even if it generates an exception. 操作串行端口的所有代码都应出现在此块或 `Try...Catch...Finally` 块中，调用以使用 方法。All code that manipulates the serial port should appear within this block, or within a `Try...Catch...Finally` block with a call to use the method. 方法将数据发送到串行端口。The method sends the data to the serial port. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#33)] 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：将字符串发送到串行端口](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)。For more information, see [How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md).

span.span: Required.
Name of the port to open.
Baud rate of the port.
Parity of the port.
Data-bit setting of the port.
Stop-bit setting of the port.

summary.span: 创建并打开一个 对象。

span.span: Creates and opens a object.

returns.span: 一个打开的 对象，用提供的参数配置。

span.span: An open object, configured with the supplied arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` 方法创建并打开一个 对象。The `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method creates and opens a object. `OpenSerialPort` 方法的参数确定 对象的设置。The arguments to the `OpenSerialPort` method determine the settings of the object. 使用对象完成后，你的代码应关闭 的对象。Your code should close the object when it is finished using the object. 您可以使用 方法显式关闭该对象，或者 `Using` 语句隐式关闭它。You can use the method to close the object explicitly or the `Using` statement to close it implicitly. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的示例。See the example in this topic for more information. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` 方法的任务示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Ports.OpenSerialPort` method. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |使用连接到串行端口的调制解调器拨号Dial a modem attached to a serial port|[如何：使用连接到串行端口的调制解调器拨号How to: Dial Modems Attached to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-dial-modems-attached-to-serial-ports.md)| |将字符串发送到串行端口Send a string to serial port|[如何：将字符串发送到串行端口How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)| |从串行端口接收字符串Receive strings from a serial port|[如何：从串行端口接收字符串How to: Receive Strings From Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-receive-strings-from-serial-ports.md)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例介绍如何将字符串发送到计算机的 `COM1` 串行端口。This example describes how to send strings to the computer's `COM1` serial port. `Using` 块允许应用程序在即使会生成异常的情况下也关闭串行端口。The `Using` block allows the application to close the serial port even if it generates an exception. 操作串行端口的所有代码都应出现在此块或 `Try...Catch...Finally` 块中，调用以使用 方法。All code that manipulates the serial port should appear within this block, or within a `Try...Catch...Finally` block with a call to use the method. 方法将数据发送到串行端口。The method sends the data to the serial port. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#33)] 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：将字符串发送到串行端口](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md)。For more information, see [How to: Send Strings to Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-send-strings-to-serial-ports.md).

span.span: is or an empty string.
is less than or equal to zero.
is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<string> SerialPortNames { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<string> SerialPortNames
Public ReadOnly Property SerialPortNames As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)
public: property System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::String ^> ^ SerialPortNames { System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::String ^> ^ get(); };
member this.SerialPortNames : System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<string>

summary.span: 获取计算机上的串行端口名称的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the names of the serial ports on the computer.

value.span: 计算机上串行端口的名称的集合。

span.span: A collection of the names of the serial ports on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` 属性获取计算机上串行端口名称的集合。The `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` property gets a collection of the names of the serial ports on the computer. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 上运行时，`My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` 返回的端口名称可能不正确。The port names returned by `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` may be incorrect when run on Windows 98. 若要防止应用程序错误，请在使用端口名称打开端口时使用异常处理（如 `Try...Catch...Finally` 语句或 `Using` 语句）。To prevent application errors, use exception handling, such as the `Try...Catch...Finally` statement or the `Using` statement, when using the port names to open ports. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` 属性的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` property. |至To|请参阅See| |-|-| |显示可用的串行端口Show available serial ports|[如何：显示可用的串行端口How to: Show Available Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|是No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|是No| ## Examples 此示例循环访问 `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` 属性返回的所有字符串。This example loops over all the strings that the `My.Computer.Ports.SerialPortNames` property returns. 这些字符串是计算机上的可用串行端口的名称。These strings are the names of the available serial ports on the computer. 通常，用户从可用端口列表中选择应用程序应使用的串行端口。Typically, a user selects which serial port the application should use from the list of available ports. 在此示例中，串行端口名称存储在 控件中。In this example, the serial port names are stored in a control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ListBox 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/listbox-control-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [ListBox Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/listbox-control-windows-forms.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#45)] 此示例需要：This example requires: - 对 命名空间的引用。A reference to the namespace. - 窗体具有名为 的 `ListBox1` 控件。That your form have a control named `ListBox1`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：显示可用的串行端口](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md)。For more information, see [How to: Show Available Serial Ports](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-show-available-serial-ports.md).
